metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16426 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
Endless recursion when handling responses from an IAS-ECC card iniasecc_select_file in libopensc/card-iasecc.c in OpenSC before 0.19.0-rc1could be used by attackers able to supply crafted smartcards to hang orcrash the opensc library using programs.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16426` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

opensc - 0.19.0-1build1
opensc-pkcs11 - 0.19.0-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: opensc package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.19.0-1build1').
